section.name: Pipeline Archetype
section.p: As SOA applications have a distinct learning curve and MaPSeq Pipelines are elaborate and extensible, MaPSeq provides a template to start developing your own Sequencing Pipelines.

subsection.name: Creating a Pipeline
subsection.p:
As a prerequisite, the developer will need to have Java installed. And as the MaPSeq archetype is highly parameterized, a number of properties must be satisfied. Here are a list required parameters to be set as arguments:
mapseqTitle
mapseqDotPackageName
mapseqSlashPackageName
mapseqGroupName
mapseqGitRepo
mapseqWorkflowName

subsection.name: Directory Layout of a MaPSeq Pipeline
subsection.p: Using the MaPSeq Pipeline Archetype, if the name of the project is "test-vcf", then following directories will be created.
